Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to the employee training incentive program
Summary: Increases the amount of the credit of eligible training costs from fifty percent to seventy percent for the employee training incentive program.
LawCode: Amd ยง443, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to the employee training incentive program
